title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 508.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 508.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to all common and contract carriers
of passengers or property required to file evidence of insurance pursuant to

Parts 750 and/or 855 of this Title, and to all bus lines regulated or
franchised by any city pursuant to section
80
(4)
of the Transportation

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
508.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
